name: Calamity Mod v2.0.1.3
description:
What is in Calamity Mod
	27 bosses and 12 minibosses
	100+ enemies
	5 city NPCs
	5 biomes and many new buildings
	1 event
	1 new playable class (based on Throwing from Terraria 1.3)
	1800+ items
	700+ weapons
	100+ blocks
	200+ pieces of furniture
	11 ores
	2 full difficulty levels above expert, separate from master
	50+ vanilla mechanic changes
	30+ new vanilla item recipes
	Over 450 tweaks and improvements to vanilla items.
	Cross mod support for Thorium Mod

name: Overhaul v5.0
description:
This is only a beta version of the Overhaul mod for Terraria 1.4 so far, so there are bugs and imperfections. But now you can download the mod and test it. According to the authors of the mod, this version is about 60%+ ready.

What is the Terraria Overhaul mod
This is a huge mod that, instead of adding new content to the game, focuses on adding new game mechanics and completely overhauling existing ones.

name: Bizarre Adventure v0.0.6.1
description:
New version of TBA (Terrarian Bizarre Adventure) mod for Terraria 1.4. Mod (jojo mod) adds stands, abilities and items from the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure universe to Terraria.
Stands that are in fashion:
Star platinum
The World
King Crimson
Aerosmith

name: JoJoStands v0.3.3.1
description: Another one dedicated to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. The sprites here are worse than in Terrarian Bizarre Adventure but still pretty good. The main advantages of the mod are a large number of stands and the fact that their abilities are close to the original source.

name: SGAmod v 3.630
description:
The mod adds new weapons, armor, mechanics and many other interesting content to Terraria. About 20 new bosses alone have been added. If you are tired of killing standard bosses, then this mod can diversify your battles

TModLoader version v0.11.8.6

name: Cheat Panel (Cheat Sheet v0.6.6.4)
description:
New version of "Cheat Mod" for Terraria. If you are not in the know, with this mod you can get any item, spawn enemies, remove debuffs and do a lot of other interesting things.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: SPLIT v 0.4.1.10
description:
The SPLIT mod adds new bosses, biomes, weapons, armor and many other interesting content to Terraria. There are even more bosses, NPCs and items in this new version of the mod.

What's in fashion
~ Over 700 new items - new unique weapons, armor sets, accessories and more! ~
~ Over 40 new enemies with unique animations and behaviors ~
~ 7 new bosses with unique AI ~
~ 6 new city NPCs - each NPC has their own interesting items to sell, and some of them can trade your items for unique gear! ~
~ Two new buildings - Stranded Ship and Underworld Domain! ~
~ Russian language support! ~
~ Support for the Boss Checklist mod by Jopojelly!

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: Calamity v1.5
description:
An update to one of the biggest mods for Terraria. In this version, the developers have added a new difficulty mode - Anger Mode and new mechanics. And also made a lot of changes to the balance of bosses and weapons. In addition, new accessories, weapons, a boss, furniture, ore, and much more were added to the game. You can read more about all the new features of this update at Calamity Mod Wiki.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.5

name: Dancing With The Dragon v0.38
description:
The mod adds summoned dragons to Terraria. According to the developer, dragons are suitable for any class. At the very beginning, you will receive a cub which you can pump into an adult dragon.

What's in fashion
- There are 11 types of young dragons in this version, and they don't have an evolutionary type yet.
- Dragon control stick with four types of damage, sold by the Merchant.
- Dragon Gene Petri Dish is sold by the Merchant and is used to create dragons.
- After defeating the Eye of Cthulhu for the first time, materials for creating dragons will begin to drop in the world.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.6

name: Archery Overhaul Mod v1.0.23
description:
Archery overhaul This is a mod that significantly changes archery in Terraria. In addition to the changes, new bows, accessories, arrows and other things related to archery will be added.

What's in fashion
... 50+ new bows
... 25 new arrows
... 6 new crossbow variants
... 30 new accessories
... 8 equipped quivers with visual effects
... 4 new armor sets
... 15 new materials
... 5 new missile grenades
... 8 new bags of loot
... 1 new NPC
... 1 new potion
... 1 new enemy
... 10+ new recipes for vanilla items

name: Providence 0.1.8.0
description:
Providence is a pretty ambitious mod for Terraria. Now it is at the pre-alpha stage, so a lot of things are not completed yet and there are bugs. But now you can play, look at the new boss, items and other content.

What's in fashion
- One boss
- One new ore
- One new set of items
- One subworld (incomplete)
- New class: Cleric
- New class: Ghost

TModLoader version v0.11.8.5

name: Castled's Equilibrium v0.9.4
description:
Castled's Equilibrium is a mod that adds new bosses, new events and other content to Terraria. The mod is quite small, but those who like to fight with new bosses should like it.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Anarchist mod v1.0.2
description:
Anarchist This is a content mod that adds new bosses, items, new NPCs and many more interesting things to Terraria)

What does the mod add?
-9 new bosses
-1000+ items including
-Multiple new enemies
-3 new city characters
-New class
-New difficulty called Anarchy Mode
-Lunar Lord Post, content with more on the way
-And various changes in the quality of life

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: No Breaking Doors v1.1.0.0
description:
No Breaking Doors is a mod that prevents goblins from breaking doors. Now you can safely use the doors in your buildings and are not afraid that they will be broken.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Exitium Vitae v0.160
description:
A small content mod for Terraria, most of the new items are weapons plus 5 items. The author of Exitium Vitae decided to make his rare and exclusive items drop throughout the game.

What's in fashion
- 20 weapons (6 legendary items, 1 relic item)
- 5 items.

name: Litho's Armory mod v3.1.0.1
description:
Litho's Armory is a content mod geared towards adding new weapons to Terraria. Of course, the mod is not limited to adding weapons only, there are many other interesting items.
What's in fashion
- 639 new weapons and ammunition!
- 4 new accessories!
- 3 new armor sets and 2 new helmets for Shrumite!
- 9 new toiletries!
- 1 new mount!
- 9 new tools!
- 3 new hook!
- 1 new pet!
- 1 new ore!

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Necromanced Bosses v0.4.1
description:
Necromanced Bosses is a content mod that adds new bosses, weapons and NPCs to Terraria. While this mod is quite small, let's hope that the authors continue to work on it and add more content. Plus, it would be nice if the authors worked on improving the sprites.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Sandwich Guy NPC v0.3.1
description:
A small mod that adds a sandwich seller to Terraria. A total of 31 items can be purchased from the vendor (22 Sandwiches and 1 Energy Drink), plus he has a weapon, a Sandwich Guy Toiletry Set, and 3 accessories.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Storm Diver's Mod v1.8.1.1
description:
Content mod that will change vanilla items and add new ones. In total, the author has created over 200 modified items, many of them are created from vanilla items, but modified ingredients have been added to their recipes.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: The Stars Above v0.5.5
description:
The mod adds new content and new Starfarer game mechanics to Terraria. It includes two aspects Umbral and Astral, each of which has its own abilities that you can combine.
A bunch of new weapons, hundreds of dialogues and of course a new boss await you. By the way, The Stars Above is specially adapted and works fine with the mod Calamity.

How the Stars Above mod adapted to Calamity
Several weapons have been specially adapted for the finale after the Moon Lord's Calamity mod, other weapons will be coming soon.
This weapon will have alternate crafting recipes and damage, scalable to the Calamity Mod if installed.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Night's Conversion
description:
What is Night's Conversion?
Night's Conversion allows you to use the properties of every sword that went into the Night's Edge. When using Night's Conversion, you can craft 3 new swords, each of which have some relation to one of the swords that went into the Night's Edge. The regular Night's Edge is assumed to be the Light's Bane version for this mod.

What does Night's Conversion add?
The first sword added is the Night's Katana. The Night's Katana has the added ability of autoswing, inherited from the Muramasa. While swinging the sword, monster spawns are also increased, due to the fact that you receive the Water Candle debuff.
The second sword added is the Night's Jungle. The Night's Jungle has the ability to poison enemies on contact, inherited from the Blade of Grass. Unlike the Blade of Grass, the Poisoned debuff is applied 100% of the time and lasts for 3 seconds.
The third sword added is the Night's Flame. The Night's Flame has the ability to burn enemies on contact, inherited from the Fiery Greatsword. The On Fire! debuff is always applied for 3 seconds.

name: Enchanted Nebula
description:
Welcome to Enchanted Nebula, This mod is a simple/basic mod. Nothing drastic has been added or removed.the mod itself simply adds in a few weapons, some joke items, and 1 boss.
The boss at this time can be summoned with a basic item created with dirt. (the recipe will change in the future)

name: Minecraft Swords Mod
description:
This mod adds the iconic swords from Minecraft:
Diamond Sword
Iron Sword
Gold Sword
Stone Sword
Wooden Sword
Netherite Sword

These are overpowered variants that are more of endgame/midgame items that can be crafted from endgame items combined with the respective material (2 diamond and 1 wood and 1 meowmere for 1 diamond sword, for example)

name: Auto Trash
description:
Previously a Cheat Sheet feature, Auto Trash is now a standalone mod. Auto Trash allows you to specify items that clutter your inventory as trash. When such an item is picked up, it automatically goes into the auto-trash slot.
Auto-Trash Slot:
Place items in the Auto-Trash slot to immediately trash them as they are picked up later. Useful for all those items that clutter your inventory.
